basics.name: Hugo Ferreira de Almeida
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: I've had the opportunity to work until now in very different environments and tasks that allowed me to grow professionally and adapt quickly to change and requirements of what is needed by business. I'm always eager to learn and get things done, I want to work in challenging problems, that have impact in peoples life, with intelligent people that allow us to grow through our experiences. On the technical side I love programming, but above that I love solving problems and learning new technologies while always looking for improvement.
